title: Cafe Evergreen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. All food is organic. Vegan choices include appetizers, wraps, sandwiches, a burger, kelp noodle stir-fry and butternut squash ravioli. An organic produce stand is located at the rear of the building. Also offers juices and smoothies. Lunch and dinner is served Mon-Sun 11am-9pm. Juice/coffee bar open Mon-Sun 9am-9pm. Breakfast is available Sat-Sun 8-11am.
